question: What was the name of the exoskeleton Tony Stark used to subdue Hulk in Age of Ultron?
correct_answer: Veronica (Hulkbuster containment system)

question: What AI was integrated into Peter Parker's suit in Spider-Man: Homecoming?
correct_answer: Karen (voiced by Jennifer Connelly)

question: What planet did Thanos retire to after the Snap in Avengers: Infinity War?
correct_answer: The Garden (officially designated Planet 0259-S)

question: What song plays during Thor's gladiatorial entrance in Ragnarok?
correct_answer: Immigrant Song by Led Zeppelin

question: What coordinates did Nebula give to locate the Soul Stone on Vormir?
correct_answer: 23-17-36-46 (from Tony's holographic map in Endgame)

question: What Kree symbol was tattooed on Yondu's face as punishment?
correct_answer: A broken crest (branding him a traitor to the Kree Empire)

question: What fictional metal alloy did Howard Stark name when describing Captain America's shield?
correct_answer: Vibranium (though in comics, it's proto-adamantium)

question: What is the street address of the New York Sanctum Sanctorum?
correct_answer: 177A Bleecker Street

question: What was the name of the boy Tony Stark befriended in Iron Man 3?
correct_answer: Harley Keener (played by Ty Simpkins)

question: What was the official code name for the Sokovia Accords legislation?
correct_answer: The Sokovia Accords: Framework for the Registration and Deployment of Enhanced Individuals

question: How many floors did Stark Tower (later Avengers Tower) have?
correct_answer: 93 floors (mentioned in Age of Ultron)

question: What model designation did Ultron give his first physical body?
correct_answer: Mark 1 (as seen in his debut scene)

question: Which actors portrayed Loki, Thor, and Odin in the Asgardian play in Ragnarok?
options: Matt Damon, Sam Neill, Luke Hemsworth
Tom Hiddleston, Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins
Benedict Cumberbatch, Idris Elba, Jeff Goldblum
Eddie Redmayne, Chris Evans, Morgan Freeman
correct_answer: Matt Damon (Loki), Sam Neill (Odin), Luke Hemsworth (Thor)

question: Where did Tony Stark perform emergency surgery to remove his arc reactor in Iron Man 3?
correct_answer: In a garage in Rose Hill, Tennessee (Harley's hometown)

question: What was the name of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s training academy where Daisy Johnson (Quake) studied?
options: The S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy of Science and Technology
correct_answer: The S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy of Science and Technology

question: What was the code name for the mission to steal the Orb in Guardians of the Galaxy?
correct_answer: The Dark Aster Heist (referring to Ronan's ship)

question: What bar did Scott Lang visit to reconnect with Luis in Ant-Man?
correct_answer: The Tipsy McStagger's (a dive bar in San Francisco)

question: What was the name of the AI controlling the Iron Legion drones in Age of Ultron?
correct_answer: J.A.R.V.I.S. (before Ultron corrupted them)

question: What is the name of the mystical symbol on Doctor Strange's sash?
correct_answer: The Seal of the Vishanti (a protective emblem)

question: What species is Groot's race classified as in the Nova Corps archives?
correct_answer: Flora colossus (from Guardians of the Galaxy's end-credits scenes)
